nodes.text: An envoy was a diplomatic title and occupation used by various different groups and organizations throughout the history of the galaxy. Envoys were known to transport people of importance, provide security and employ ambassadors across the galaxy.
The Jedi Order were known to employ envoys as well as various governments that included both Old and New Republics, the Galactic Empire[source?] and the Chiss Ascendancy.
At least one ship was also named Envoy.
